artist: Artist: John M. Bennett; Artist: K. S. Ernst; Artist: Philip Gallo; Artist: Scott Helmes; Artist: Franz Kamin; Artist: Richard Kostelanetz; Publisher: Stamp Pad Press/ Hermetic Press, Minnepolis

description: Six plates in an unbound booklet, with title page and index page; each plate labeled with artist's name; four folded sheets

medium: Color relief prints, letterpress; unbound booklet

title: Six Visual Poems
